dcterms:creator: U Grömping
dcterms:description: This dataset captures demographic (age, gender), personal (marital status), and financial (income, credit duration) details of about 1000 loan applicants. Each applicant is labeled as either a good customer or a bad customer depending on their credit risk. Two versions of this dataset have been released, with the second version incorporating corrections to coding errors in the first dataset.
dcterms:title: German credit dataset

dcterms:creator: Min Li
Amy Mickel
Stanley Taylor
dcterms:description: This dataset contains information pertaining to 2102 small business loans approved by the state of California during the years of 1989 − 2012, capturing temporal shifts in the data. It comprises about 24 features capturing various details of the small businesses including zip codes, business category, number of jobs created, and financial status of the business.
dcterms:title: Small Business Administration (SBA) case dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Cortez
A. Silva
dcterms:description: This dataset contains student performance records of 649 students from two Portuguese secondary schools, capturing geospatial shift. It comprises information about the academic background (grades, absences, access to internet, failures etc.) of each student along with other demographic attributes.
dcterms:title: Student performance records
